EidIdtEXT: After a whole year of patiently, but eagerly waiting, Eid is finally here! Hands up everyone who missed the incense smells, the outfits and the delicious food? But first, let’s get Eid-ready with our outfits.
takbeertext: Now that we’re ready in our new Eid outfits, it’s time for Takbeer or Eid prayers. Let’s revel in this beautiful moment. Later, let’s join the family gathering and exchange warm greetings with loved ones.
thanitext: After that much-needed family time, it’s the kids’ favourite part, Eideyah! Time for them to engage in friendly banter as to who received the most.
modaltext: For better user experience enable the audio access
